alert.note: Alert for Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 7:42PM CDT until May 18 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Channing, or 24 miles north of Vega, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Channing, Boys Ranch, Masterson and Four Way. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
